effects.name: Stunning
effects.description: The targeted Champion's are affected by control and cannot take any action.

effects.name: Ivy Thorn
effects.description: Deals Physical DMG based on the attacker's ATK per second. Stackable up to 3 times.

effects.name: Divine Shield
effects.description: Absorbs damage at a percetage of Wonder Woman's Max HP.

effects.name: Vulnerability
effects.description: Increases Physical DMG taken. Cannot be dispelled.

effects.name: Joker Venom
effects.description: Deals Spiritual DMG per second, for 20 seconds, stacking up to 100 time(s).

effects.name: Mind Ward
effects.description: When the target is hit by a skill other than a basic attack, summoner performs a counterattack on the attacker, dealing Spiritual DMG.

effects.name: Super Armor
effects.description: Prevents actions or skills from being interrupted by enemy attacks.

effects.name: Taunted
effects.description: Forces the affected target to attack the summoner with basic attacks.

effects.name: Shield
effects.description: Blocks a certain amount of DMG.

effects.name: Krypton Energy
effects.description: At 4, 12, and 27 Krypton Energy Points all [Superman Family] allies ATK is increased by 25%, 50%, and 75% respectively.

effects.name: Engine Oil
effects.description: Each stack slows the target, stacking up to 5 times. Cannot be dispelled.

effects.name: Bewitch
effects.description: Causes the target to slowly move towards summoner.

effects.name: Speed Force Resonance
effects.description: Increases Dodge.

effects.name: Robustness
effects.description: Increases the target's Physical DEF for 20 seconds.

effects.name: Swamp
effects.description: Reduces DMG taken by allies within range.

effects.name: Taunt
effects.description: Forces the affected target to attack the summoner with basic attacks.

effects.name: Taunts
effects.description: Forces the affected target to attack the summoner with basic attacks.

effects.name: Emergency Repair
effects.description: Champion restores a percentage of Max HP per second. Cannot be dispelled.

effects.name: Silence
effects.description: Prevents the use of active skills.

effects.name: Holographic Decoy
effects.description: The decoy emits electromagnetic interference every second to disrupt enemies, reducing their Crit RES, stacking up to 8 times(s).

effects.name: Freezing
effects.description: Incapaciates the target for 3 seconds.

effects.name: Panic
effects.description: The target's Spiritual DEF reduces.

effects.name: Frostbite
effects.description: Increases the target's Physical DMG taken.

effects.name: Memtal Breakdown
effects.description: Incapacitates and slightly shrinks the target, and reduces their MEN.

effects.name: Deadly Mark
effects.description: Increases target's Counterattack DMG taken, stacking up to 10 times.

effects.name: Solar Energy
effects.description: Increases ATJ, stacking up to 3 time(s).

effects.name: Burn
effects.description: Deals Spiritual DMG based on summoner's ATK, per second.

effects.name: Scare
effects.description: Reduces the target's DMG dealt, stacking up to 4 time(s).

effects.name: Ivy Bloom
effects.description: Heals by 1% of the summoner's ATK per second. Stackable up to 3 times.

effects.name: Shockwave
effects.description: Reduces the target's Physical DEF.

effects.name: Bleeding
effects.description: Deals Physical DMG per second, for 5 seconds.

effects.name: Frozen
effects.description: Incapacitates the target.

effects.name: Self-Actualization
effects.description: Increases ATK and enhances attacks to deal AoE damage in a small area.
